lom:description.lom:string: Youth-centered website on petroleum science. The stie has properties of crude oil, formations, exploration techniques and tools, off-shore platforms, refineries and impact on the environment. There are a number of interactive exercises: drilling lessons, exploration, quiz, forum, and a forum. Developed by ThinkQuest, a global network of students, teachers, parents, and technologists dedicated to youth-centered learning on the internet.
